projectList.title: Portfolio
projectList.description: The site you are currently viewing was a custom creation. The different types of projects I have created all had seperate requirements to be viewable inline within the website.

projectList.title: MockAPI
projectList.description: Allows the creation of real endpoints which return randonly generated fake data. The data can be easily curated for any desired return schema. The data generator exports functions to generate many different properties.

projectList.title: Cityscape
projectList.description: Randomly generated trapezoid of varying shapes and colours which form a city skyline looking scene.
